GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.description: Returns day-wise session and recording analytics data of an organization for the specified time range start_date to end_date. If start_date and end_date are not provided, the default time range is set from 30 days ago to the current date.

recording_stats.description: Recording statistics of an organization during the range specified

total_recording_minutes.description: Total recording minutes for a specific day

total_recordings.description: Total number of recordings for a specific day

recording_count.description: Total number of recordings during the range specified

recording_minutes_consumed.description: Total recording minutes during the range specified

session_stats.description: Session statistics of an organization during the range specified

total_session_minutes.description: Total session minutes for a specific day

total_sessions.description: Total number of sessions for a specific day

sessions_count.description: Total number of sessions during the range specified

sessions_minutes_consumed.description: Total session minutes during the range specified

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/a.summary: Fetch day-wise session and recording analytics data for an organization
